import React from 'react' import hero from '../assets/hero.png' const Hero = () => { const socialMedia= [ 'logo-instragram', 'logo-facebook', 'logo-linkedin', 'logo-twitter', ] return (

Hello!
My name is Ali Raza

Fullstack Developer

{ socialMedia?.map(icon=>(
)) }
) } export default Hero
